name: Pils al Pastor
garnish: Rim of one part La Bôite NYC Izak N.37 and four parts kosher salt
preparation: Shake the tequila, liqueur, Pok Pok Som and lime juice with ice, top with the pilsner, and strain into a chilled ice-filled Pilsner glass rimmed with a blend of one part La Bôite NYC Izak N.37 and four parts kosher salt.
